page.title: 17COVERDALE WOMENS INSTITUTE.
page.content: Founded in 1929 present membership 43 average monthly attendance 30, meet in Coverdale Memorial Hall in the village of Carlton 3miles from Horsehouse. Meet 3rd. Wed.each month 7.15 _ 9.45pm 1985 subscriptons Â£4.00. From survry area 3committee members & 3 new members for 1986 (2moved into area in last 12months) {1985 Programme Jan. _ Talk on Epitaphs. Feb. _ Quiz between 2 other WI March _ Fashion Show shop from Bedale. April._ Preston Hand Bellringers. May. _ Cookery demonstration. June. _ Speaking Personally. July. _ No meeting. Aug. _ Weight Watchers. Sept. _ Flower arranging. Oct. _ Slides from the Canary Island Nov. _ Annual General Meeting. Dec. _ Members Christmas Party.
